description: Comprehensive immigration assistance platform with AI-powered chat, document processing, case management, and RAG pipeline - built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, Supabase, and Context7 patterns
rules: Use Next.js 15 with App Router and TypeScript for all frontend code
Use Supabase for authentication, database, and storage - never NextAuth
Follow Context7 patterns for scalability, observability, and maintainability
Use @supabase/ssr for authentication instead of deprecated auth-helpers
Use official OpenAI SDK instead of deprecated openai-edge
Use Trigger.dev v3 tasks API instead of deprecated v2 client
Implement proper error boundaries and type safety throughout
Use Shadcn UI components with Tailwind CSS for consistent styling
Follow monorepo structure with packages for shared functionality
Use Drizzle ORM for database schema and migrations
Implement RAG pipeline with vector embeddings for document processing
Use Hono for API routes and backend services
Implement proper rate limiting and security measures
Use proper Context7 observability and logging patterns
